00023 const int archive_flags = archive::no_header | archive::no_codecvt; 
00024 
00025 template<class T> inline void read_image(T& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00026         stringstream istr((char*)ptr->getData());
00027         {
00028                 boost::archive::text_iarchive ia(istr, archive_flags);
00029                 ia & dat;
00030         }
00031         //make sure oa is deconstructed to avoid stream_error exception.
00032 
00033 }
00034 
00035 template<class T> inline void write_image(const T& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00036         stringstream ostr;
00037         {
00038                 boost::archive::text_oarchive oa(ostr, archive_flags);
00039                 oa & dat;
00040         }
00041         //make sure oa is deconstructed to avoid stream_error exception.        
00042         ptr->setData(ostr.str().c_str(), ostr.str().size() );
00043 }

00053 template<> inline void read_image<string>(string& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00054         dat = (string)((char*)ptr->getData() );
00055 }
00056 
00057 template<> inline void write_image<string>(const string& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00058         ptr->setData(dat.c_str(), dat.size()+1);
00059 }

00070 template<> inline void read_image<int>(int& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00071         memcpy(&dat, ptr->getData(), ptr->getSize());
00072 }
00073 
00074 template<> inline void write_image<int>(const int& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00075         ptr->setData(&dat, sizeof(int));
00076 }
00077 
00078 template<> inline void read_image<unsigned int>(unsigned int& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00079         memcpy(&dat, ptr->getData(), ptr->getSize());
00080 }
00081 
00082 template<> inline void write_image<unsigned int>(const unsigned int& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00083         ptr->setData(&dat, sizeof(unsigned int));
00084 }
00085 
00086 template<> inline void read_image<vector<int> >(vector<int>& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00087         dat.resize( ptr->getSize()/sizeof(int) );       
00088         memcpy(&dat[0], ptr->getData(), ptr->getSize() );
00089 }
00090 
00091 template<> inline void write_image<vector<int> >(const vector<int>& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00092         ptr->setData( &dat[0], sizeof(int)*dat.size() );
00093 }
00094 
00095 template<> inline void read_image<vector<unsigned int> >(vector<unsigned int>& dat, const DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00096         dat.resize( ptr->getSize()/sizeof(unsigned int) );
00097         memcpy(&dat[0], ptr->getData(), ptr->getSize());
00098 }
00099 
00100 template<> inline void write_image<vector<unsigned int> >(const vector<unsigned int>& dat, DbObjPtr& ptr) {
00101         ptr->setData( &dat[0], sizeof(int)*dat.size() );
00102 }
